main.title: Oven Baked Sweet potatoes
main.description: The healthy snack for sports fan and movie munchers. Perfect for binging on during games and movie nite without racking up the calories.

directions: Peel the sweet potatoes
Drench in olive oil
Add salt to taste
Add a pinch of Rosemary and Thyme
Bake in oven for 1hr at 220F/120C
Enjoy your snack
Wash the rice in cold water to remove excess starch
Drench a pan in olive oil and take to medium high
Cut the chicken and add to sizzling pan until the chicken turns white
Add a pinch of Rosemary and Thyme
Add salt, black pepper and cayenne pepper to taste
Fry your tomato paste in olive oil for 20 minutes at medium heat
Add the washed rice to the fried paste
Add enough water to just cover the rice
Cook on low heat for 60 minutes
Cut the tomatoes and spring onions into small pieces and add to the rice mixture
Add the chicken to the rice mixture
Thoroughly mix everything together
Turn off the heat of the rice
Fry the eggs to your liking
Serve the rice and the eggs.
Enjoy

main.title: Melon Berry Blast Smoothie
main.description: Refreshing blast of watermelon and strawberry nutrients. Best for after workouts to rejuvenate the spirit or just to entertain the family.

directions: Crush some ice
Remove the seeds from the watermelon if any
Remove stem from strawberry
Put half a cup of milk and crushed ice in a blender
Add all the fruits and ice cream into the blender
Mix into a puree context
